original_title: 福岡恋愛白書 13 ~ キミの世界の向こう側 ~
overview: The university student Sota falls in love with a girl at the library at first sight. However, she was born deaf. Determined not to give up, Sota starts learning sign language and they fall in love. Will they be able to overcome the fact that they live in different worlds?
title: Love Stories from Fukuoka 13: Beyond Your World
